name: Pub Night
description:
This game is my submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. I've been suffering from a bad cold these past couple days, so I unfortunately wasn't able to make anything that good. Nevertheless, I'm glad I at least made something, even if I personally think of that something as a 10 second long waste of time. 

Oh well, better luck next time. I hope at least you like it a little. Maybe you'll relate to wanting to join your friends in a pub...
